name: Leela Usha Mahila Utkarsh Trust
briefDescription: This trust has started with the noble object to help the students in november-2004 by Shri Gunvantbhai B. Dave. The main objective of this trust is to uplift the women of all ages. Women of today should be confident in Information and technology rather than doing classes such as embroidery, sewing, rangoli-making, beauty parlor, mahendi etc. Thus the trust has started with the noble course to educate women in the field of computer free of cost.The Trust’s motto is “ Women empowerment by education.”
